extendedInfo.description: This software is to help the build of your character in Perfect World (MMORPG).You can help this software divulging and collaborating with suggestions for new build.This version contains information for the all Class Wizard, Blademaster, Archer, Cleric, Barbarian, Venomancer, Assassin, Psychic, Seeker, Mystic;Send your suggestion to build classes of Perfect World.http://software.dukitan.com/profileperfectworld

reviews.title: Needs more options
reviews.comment: As far as armor goes for all classes. Shows light only for cleric and I use arcane. Otherwise decent app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Decent builds, useful for starters
reviews.comment: Standardized builds like most build guides that can be found online. Useful class intro for starters but info can be easily found online. Would be better if there\'s more guides for builds, e.g. include skills for diff builds. Great app overall.
reviews.author: Alina Wu

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Gj nice builds so i can make my bm hybrid
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs completion
reviews.comment: The only cleric build is light armor.  That isn\'t even the standard build.  Additional info for gear would be nice.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: great
reviews.comment: great stuff it help me balancing my level 50 blademaster into unstopable pawn :D

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: There is no arcane option for winged elf cleric.  And this app could have a lot more info about the game and how to better your character.
reviews.author: Freya Skipz

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy
reviews.comment: Works great. Add info on fbs and bhs. Or maybe even Craft guide, or an auction house bid screen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Would be better if it gave advice on how to build classes i.e. ignore vitality and get only dexterity because ....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Kringel
reviews.comment: Thank you so much! It helped me revive my veno,and make  new goals
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Im a girl sry my name is not fiaz it my bro\'s account , and i luv anything with pwi ;) im a lvl 78 , also  60 in pwi
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: This is VERY helpful for someone like me who just started playing pw. Thanks! :D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: PWI app
reviews.comment: Finally a PW app. Nut how lame.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Avid player of pwi its wayg off for a build for anything.
reviews.author: Everette Munns

reviews.title: lacking builds
reviews.comment: not all builds available, in making a cleric..only the light armor build (the bad one) is available. add pure mag build for cleric
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: better off using website for info
reviews.comment: other than being a one time look over for people that are new to pwi this app has no use other than that, also a lot of the info on classes is not acurate at what potential they have (pro\'s\\con\'s). I give this app a one for having such little use and giving bad info.
reviews.author: Demagien Noetase

reviews.title: No point
reviews.comment: Even reinstalled it a week later to make sure there wasn\'t anything I missed. It seems like it would help me try different builds, but it doesn\'t.
reviews.author: Allen McGrew
